dublin_core.dcvalue: The purpose of the project was to establish computer networks between selected hospitals through high speed communication and high power computer processing to electronically exchange medical information and to conduct clinical examination and consultation Quality medical services can thus be provided to patients in the remote rural areas such as villages and small towns in the mountains on the coasts and islets away from Taiwan It also intended to facilitate continuing education for doctors in those areas This study evaluates telemedicine between Taipei Veterans General Hospital and Kinmen Granite Hospital
Zhonghua yi xue za zhi = Chinese medical journal; Free China ed
Tele-emergency medicine: the evaluation of Taipei Veterans General Hospital and Kinmen-Granite Hospital in Taiwan.
